Text:
Have been waiting a long time to say this, as I had limited internet access. 
Thank You for all the releases after you came back.
Great quality, but it's got a giant watermark in the upper left corner that's pretty annoying.

It was the only 1080p source I could find and you're obviously exaggerating about the watermark being GIANT.It's not so bad considering the other source I thought of ripping before I found this one had a big watermark on the right corner of the screen which was even more annoying.
great movie and superb quailty. The watermark is a tiny logo of Canal+.  Thanks again
